page.title: 03THE NEW ESTATES
page.content:
Many new houses have been built in the last 5 years in the {West End of Clevedon.Building is still going on.
In a survey we held we asked people about living on a new estate. Everyone said the people were friendly.Most of the families had moved because of the husband's job.Half the people said they could do their shopping easily,although three quarters said a shopping @rcinct would improve things. Most people said they liked the area and just under half said they had things wrong with their house. Over half said the new school was near enough and under half thought that no more building should take place. Because of these estates Clevedon is changing more quickly now than ever.
